subtitle: Discover villages and places near you.
not_found_city: Sorry, I couldn't find the city "{city}".
missing_verb: Please use an action verb among:
not_understood: I did not understand your request.
show_map_first: Please display the map first to use city or action verbs.
text_slide_1: Discover all the activities you can do around you.
text_slide_2: Get all the information about interesting activities/places for you.
text_slide_3: A voice assistant is available to help you with your searches.
